body_text: If the anime came first, what is considered "canon"? In the case of many anime where the manga came first, things that are included in the anime but not the manga (such as filler arcs) seem to be not considered totally canon to the series, indicating that manga is generally what is considered to set canon. One example of this is the Quincy arc in Bleach. For series where the anime came first, such as Code Geass, is the anime then considered to set canon?
Is Dragon Ball Super considered canon? Is Dragon Ball Super considered an original works by Akira Toriyama?
